mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REFUND ( RF_RESER_NO, REFUND_PRICE, REFUND_ACC_NO, REFUND_NAME, BANK ) VALUES ( #{ reserNo }, #{ refundPrice }, #{ accNo }, #{ refundName }, #{ bank } )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_RESERVATION SET CANCEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE RESER_NO = #{reserNo}
mapper.select: SELECT RF_RESER_NO, REFUND_PRICE, REFUND_ACC_NO, REFUND_NAME, BANK FROM TB_REFUND JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (RF_RESER_NO = RESER_NO) WHERE RF_RESER_NO = #{reserNo}
